body_text:
S&I has been asked to run a mobile promotion via Heartbeat before the end of the year, and to better target users likely to benefit from the promotion, they want to be able to target users by the number of sync clients they have (mobile vs desktop), and by the age of the user's profile and how active they are in using Firefox.
Since the system add-on probably won't hit release before the end of the year, our best bet for this is a patch to Firefox to add this to UITour. A Firefox bug with a WIP patch already exists: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1305878
